title: Hear Submissively to Change Old Perceptions | Sri Madhu Pandit Dasa | SB 3.22.10 | 07.08.2024
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: Reading from Srimad Bhatavatam, 10-3, Chapter 22, Entitled
The Marriage of Tardamamuni and Devahuti

Translation in purport by His Divine Grace A.C. Vattivedanta Swami Srila Prabhupada
Translation in purport by His Divine Grace A.C. Vattivedanta Swami Srila Prabhupada
Translation in purport by His Divine Grace A.C. Vattivedanta Swami Srila Prabhupada
The moment she heard from the sage Narada of your noble character,
learning, beautiful appearance, youth and other virtues,
she fixed her mind upon you.
Purport by His Divine Grace A.C. Vattivedanta Swami Srila Prabhupada
The girl Devahuti did not personally see Tardamamuni,
She did not personally see Tardamamuni,
his character or qualities, since there was no social intercourse by which she could gain
But she heard about Tridamamuni from the authority of Narada Muni.
Hearing from an authority is a better experience than gaining personal understanding.
She heard from Narada Muni that Tridamamuni was just fit to be her husband, therefore
she became fixed in her heart that she would marry him, and she expressed her desire to
her father who therefore brought her before him.
Devahuti, the daughter of Swayambhuva Manu.
came to fix her mind upon desiring Kardamamuni, is being explained by Manu, and it is specifically
